DOC.brief_summary: The clinical safety Sahastara remedy alcoholic extract healthy volunteer . Investigators investigate safety 100 200 mg Sahastara remedy extract capsule healthy volunteer . This Clinical trial Phase I .
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Safety Alcoholic Extract Sahastara Remedy Extract Capsule Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The sahastara remedy ( SHT ) Thai traditional medicine use relieve pain musculoskeletal problem . There study show SHT extract find acute chronic toxicity rat . However , study regard safety human . Thus , study clinical trial Phase I investigate clinical safety SHT alcoholic extract healthy volunteer . The clinical safety monitor 28 day continuously use 100 200 mg SHT extraction 3 time day stop intervention 14 day .
DOC.criteria: No pregnancy No Serious Medical Condition evaluate Physical Examination Laboratory result 1 month study No Supplementary food and/or Vitamin study Able follow suggestion study Uncontrolled Hypertension ( BP > 140/90 mm.Hg . ) BMI > 30 Have serious medical condition include Severe peptic ulcer , congestive heart disease , Liver Renal dysfunction . On use medicine include Rifampicin , Phenytoin , Propranolol , Theophylline
